name: [DEMO] Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!!
name_original: [DEMO] Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!!
description:
Love is in the Air...

After playing a visual novel featuring only yandere love interests, our protagonist wakes up as the main character of the game! As much as he loves the archetype, he really doesn't want to end up dead... Can you help him survive his suitors?

Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!! is a comedic BxB visual novel with two love interests to romance escape from. While there will be romantic scenes throughout the game, there will not be any traditional paired endings.

Warning!

Please be advised that this visual novel demo contains mentions of live dissection and gore. This scene is skippable.

The full game is expected to have mentions and depictions of violence, stalking, underage drinking, dismemberment, imprisonment, demons, (food) poisoning, kidnapping, and suicide.

Demo Features
  • 9.4k+ words
  • Partial voice acting 
  • 5 Expressive sprites
  • 3 CGs
  • CG gallery

Credits

The Team

CG & Sprite Artist, Writer: Pumpkin Spike
Editor, Voice Director: Smoke Mirror
Sprite Colorist: Akua
Audio Engineer: Jacen Wiley
Music: Oneul

Music tracks can be found on youtube!

In Development...

Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!! is currently in development! Weekly project updates will be posted on Twitter. Demo 2.0 will release in Summer 2022 with an expanded storyline. The game is expected to be completed in early 2023.
